project.title: Noise and Hearing Conservation Awareness
project.description:
This eLearning is intended to create awareness on noise, its effects to health & how to control noise at the workplace.
By the end of this module, learners should be able to: •define noise and its effects to health •explain the importance of noise control and hearing conservation •describe the probable high noise areas and the action to control noise exposure at workplace
Content Owner : Upstream Health Safety Environment of PETRONAS Carigali Sdn Bhd (PCSB) Duration : 60 minutes Assessment : 10 Multiple Choice & True False Questions Pass percentage : 80%
If you encounter any difficulties to access this eLearning, kindly contact PETRONAS Contact Center for assistance.
